summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Sewerage Utility; amending Section 4 of Ordinance No. 84390 to correct meter charges for the two inch (2") and the six inch (6") meter service to premises whose sewage is not delivered to the Southwest Suburban Sewer District; and changing the "Basic Treatment and Disposal Charge" for customers whose sewage is delivered to the Southwest Suburban Sewer District.
